generated_body: The article likely discusses the resurgence of Baylor University's football program following a period of turmoil linked to a sexual assault scandal. Readers can expect insights into how the team has managed to regain its competitive status within college football, possibly addressing changes in coaching, player recruitment, and community engagement.
